tuv.seg: You do not have permission to modify this record.
[Address Book] Can browse the address book
[Address Book] Can import/upload records into the address book
[Address Book] Can modify email address contacts
[Address Book] Can broadcast compose email to address lists
[Address Book] Can export email address lists to CSV/XML
[Address Book] Can export organization lists to CSV/XML
[Display Ticket] Can forward tickets to third-party email addresses
[Display Ticket] Can add sticky notes to tickets
[Display Ticket] Can permanently delete messages on tickets
[Home] Can build private workspaces and worklists
[Mail] Can open tickets on behalf of customers
[Mail] Can use the Search tab on the Mail page
[Mail] Can compose new messages from the helpdesk
[RSS] Can export lists as RSS feeds
[Tasks] Can export task lists to CSV/XML
[Tickets] Can assign tickets to other workers
[Tickets] Can broadcast reply to ticket lists
[Tickets] Can bulk update tickets in lists
[Tickets] Can export ticket lists to CSV/XML
[Tickets] Can use the pile sorter on lists
[Watchers] Can add other workers as watchers
[Watchers] Can remove other workers as watchers
Blank values for custom fields should clear the field (if unchecked, blank values are skipped)
Import the first row (only check this if the dropdowns contain real data)
Replace all passwords with import values, even if they already exist
(any column order; the next step will let you choose where the data goes)
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this community portal?
(optional, friendly URLs for Apache Web Server users)

Place the index.php file in a new directory on the appropriate public website. This directory can be named anything but will usually describe the portal. For example: http://www.cerberusweb.com/support/
Your IP address (%s) is not authorized to run scheduler jobs. Your administrator needs to authorize your IP in Helpdesk Setup or in the framework.config.php file under AUTHORIZED_IPS_DEFAULTS.
Are you sure you want to delete this entire workspace?
Would you like to move this conversation?
Who should this be assigned to?
When would you like to resume this conversation?
(leave blank to wait for a reply before resuming)
Read all messages in chronological order (A)
#### This message was created by %s on your behalf.
Send a copy of this message to the recipients.
There are no available tickets matching your selection.
Click here to create your first workspace.
You haven't created any custom worklists.
%s is already assigned to a worker.
The confirmation code you provided is not valid.

%s has just added this email address to their helpdesk account.
To approve and continue, click the following link: %s
If you did not request this, do not click the link above. The request will expire in 24 hours.
A confirmation email has been sent to %s
%s is not a valid email address.
This confirmation code will allow you to reset your helpdesk login: %s
examples: now today -2 days -1 month, 2 days last Friday next Monday Jan 9 2002
Any words: payment receipt order sale Booleans: +payment -receipt +payment credit Wildcards: web* Exact phrases: "credit card" Boosting: cerberus >helpdesk login
Use an asterisk (*) for wildcards. For example: *receipt*
Please correct the following errors before upgrading:
Your IP address (%s) is not authorized to update this helpdesk. Your administrator needs to authorize your IP in Helpdesk Setup or in the framework.config.php file under AUTHORIZED_IPS_DEFAULTS.
Another administrator is currently running an update. Please wait...
These addresses will be associated with your helpdesk account.
Always use 'read all' mode (expand messages and sort chronologically)
When I click the reply button:

When opening a new ticket, default the status to:
When replying to mail, default the status to:
